abilities.name: Fix Dat Armour Up
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, in your Command phase, you can return 1 destroyed Bodyguard model to that unit.

abilities.name: More Dakka
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re‑roll a Hit roll of 1.

abilities.name: Grot Oiler
abilities.rule:
Once per battle, at the end of your Movement phase, one model in the bearer’s unit regains D3 lost wounds.

***Designer’s Note**: Place a Grot Oiler token next to the unit, removing it once this ability has been used.*
